alert.note: Alert for Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued July 20 at 7:05AM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...A Wind Advisory is in effect... * Fresh to strong trade winds is expected to impact the islands today peaking to 30 mph with higher gusts... * TIMING...through this evening. * IMPACTS...Expect possible downed tree limbs as well as shifting of loose and unsecured small objects due to strong winds. Gusty winds will make driving difficult and may cause hazardous conditions for mariners. FAUTUAGA MO SAVILI MALOLOSI OFISA O LE TAU PAGO PAGO AS 705 TAEAO ASO LULU IULAI 20 2022 ...Ua iai nei le FAUTUAGA MO SAVILI MALOLOSI... * ...E agi malosi le tuaoloa i le aso ma e fa`atupula`ia e o`o atu i le 30 mph ma e agi fa`ata`uta`u i taimi... * TAIMI...seia oo i le afiafi nei. * AAFIAGA...E pau`u ai laau lelea ai mea-totino e le`i faamaumauina ma faaleagaina ai apa ma taualuga o fale. Savili malolosi e mafai ona faafaigata ai ona faafoe ai taavale, ae maise lava taavale maualuluga. E sousou foi le sami ona o le malolosi o savili. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O fautuaga mo savili malolosi o lona uiga o savili e 35 mph ma e agi faata`uta`u o loo aafia ai le atunuu. O nei savili malolosi o le a faafaigata ai ona faafoe taavale i luga o le auala tele, ae maise lava taavale tetele ma le maualuluga. Faamolemole ia faautagia mai lenei fautuaga.
info.instruction: A wind advisory means that winds of 35 MPH are expected. Winds This strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
